testSteps.Step_Desc: Login to GitHub with valid credentials. [Test Data- Email: valid@email.com, Password: validPassword] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: User is logged in.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Click on 'New repository' button. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: 'Create a new repository' page is displayed.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Enter 'my-repo' in the Repository name field. [Test Data- Repository name: my-repo] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: Repository name is accepted.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Enter 'Test repo' in the Description field. [Test Data- Description: Test repo] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: Description is accepted.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Select 'Public' or 'Private' as the visibility option. [Test Data- Visibility: Public/Private] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: Visibility is set to Public or Private as selected.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Click 'Create repository'. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: Repository is created and user is redirected to the new repository page.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Verify that the repository visibility setting reflects the selected option post-creation. [Test Data- Visibility: Public/Private] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: Repository visibility matches the selected option (Public/Private) after creation.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Login to GitHub with valid credentials. [Test Data- Email: valid@email.com, Password: validPassword] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: User is logged in.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Click on 'New repository' button. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: 'Create a new repository' page is displayed.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Leave the Repository name field blank. [Test Data- Repository name: ''] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: Repository name field is empty.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Enter 'Test repo' in the Description field. [Test Data- Description: Test repo] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: Description is accepted.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Select 'Public' or 'Private' as the visibility option. [Test Data- Visibility: Public/Private] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: Visibility is set to Public or Private as selected.

testSteps.Expected_Result: Error message is displayed for blank repository name.

testSteps.Expected_Result: 'Create a new repository' page is displayed.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Enter 'my-repo' in the Repository name field (name already exists). [Test Data- Repository name: my-repo] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: Repository name is entered.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Enter 'Duplicate repo' in the Description field. [Test Data- Description: Duplicate repo] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: Description is accepted.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Select 'Public' or 'Private' as the visibility option. [Test Data- Visibility: Public/Private] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]

testSteps.Step_Desc: Enter 'repo#name' in the Repository name field (contains invalid character '#'). [Test Data- Repository name: repo#name] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
testSteps.Expected_Result: Repository name is entered.
